name: Dean Norris
info:
• 简体中文名: 迪恩·诺里斯
  • 别名: Dean Joseph Norris
  • 性别: 男
  • 生日: 1963-04-08
  • 母校: Harvard University Royal Academy of Dramatic Art
  • 出生地: South Bend, Indiana, U.S.
  • 居住地: Temecula, California
  • 配偶: Bridget Norris
detail: Dean Joseph Norris (born April 8, 1963) is an American actor, best known for portraying DEA agent Hank Schrader on the AMC series Breaking Bad (2008–2013) and town councilman James "Big Jim" Rennie on the CBS series Under the Dome (2013–2015). He has appeared in films such as Lethal Weapon 2 (1989), Hard To Kill (1990), Total Recall (1990), Terminator 2: Judgment Day (1991), Starship Troopers (1997), The Cell (2000), Little Miss Sunshine (2006), Evan Almighty (2007), and Sons of Liberty (2015).
